alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa; Santa Rosa (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 4:14PM EDT until August 05 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Okaloosa County in northwestern Florida... Southeastern Santa Rosa County in northwestern Florida... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 314 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Bagdad, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Milton, Mary Esther, Bagdad, Navarre, and Navarre Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
